message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Address details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_RV_FINAL_RECORD_DELETE
message.locale: At least one address record must exist. This record cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_IDENTIFICATION_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Identification details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_IDENTIFICATION_RV_FINAL_RECORD_DELETE
message.locale: At least one identification record must exist. This record cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_NAME_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Name details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_NAME_FV_REG_NAME_DELETE
message.locale: You cannot delete a registered name.

message.name: ERR_BIRTH_AND_DEATH_RV_FINAL_RECORD_DELETE
message.locale: A Birth and Death record must exist. This record cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_EMAIL_ADDRESS_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Email Address details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_GENDER_RV_FINAL_RECORD_DELETE
message.locale: A Gender record must exist. This record cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_NUMBER_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Phone details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_RELATIONSHIPS_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Relationship details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_PREFS_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Contact Preference details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_BANK_ACCOUNT_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Bank account details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
